alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weber... southeastern Box Elder...western Salt Lake...western Davis... northwestern Utah and northeastern Tooele Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway to 8 miles south of Tooele Army Depot. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Syracuse, Clinton, Stansbury Park, Hooper, Tooele Army Depot, Magna, Bingham Canyon Mine, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, West Haven, West Point, Plain City, Stockton, Rush Valley, West Warren and Erda. This storm will be capable of producing strong gusty winds on the Great Salt Lake. This will lead to a sudden increase in waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 87 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Salt Lake City.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
